# debugDescription

**Instance Property**

A textual representation of the array and its elements, suitable for debugging.

## Declaration

```swift
var debugDescription: String { get }
```

## Describing an Array

- **description**: A textual representation of the array and its elements.
- **customMirror**: A mirror that reflects the array.
- **hash(into:)**: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.

items.description: A textual representation of the array and its elements.
